attributes.action: calling for diane abbott to be fired for racism
attributes.additional_details: racism does cut both ways for all residents and mps of the uk , Her slur on twitter about whites was in context and i am trying to bring up my son right thinking all people are our brothers and sisters and her comment my son is now asking me questions about does she hate him , What with the tory nazi party on his party stag do i am starting to wonder , The only moral outcome can be to sack her for this
